text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/IROgO3eHbQ

On 27 April, 2,685 new cases and 17 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK

33,843,580 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine and 13,201,811 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/Vm76wcZCVj
